hero.title: Join the Bot Democratization Movement
hero.text: We are building a community for developers and non-developers to create and share their automations.

steps.title: Step 1
steps.text: Select, Drag and Drop your blocks

box_1.title: Boto is a platform where non-developers can build their own logic using pre-built blocks from the marketplace and socialize their automation with others.

first.title: Our Mission
first.text: Build a community for developers and non-developers to create and share their automations.

second.title: Be the first to know when we are live and start building your bots!

subsection.title: XRPL Grants Program
subsection.text: Supporting the open source ecosystem around the XRP Ledger in order to boost inclusive standards and innovation in the Internet of Value.
